SummaryEnglish: Boku no Piko is a hentai shotacon yaoi anime mini-series. It consists of four episodes: Boku no Piko (My Pico), Piko to Chiko (Pico to Chico), Piko: Boku no Chiisana Natsu Monogatari (Pico: My Little Summer Story), & Piko x Coco x Chiko (Pico x Coco x Chico). It is produced by Natural High. It is censored and English subtitled.

1.SummaryEnglish: Pico, an effeminate boy, works in his grandfather's coffee shop during the summer, hoping to make friends. He meets a man named Mokkun, who seduces him, thinking that Pico is a girl.

2.SummaryEnglish: Pico encontra um garoto chamado Chico nadando pelado, e os dois começam uma amizade

3.SummaryEnglish: Pico e Chico conhece um travesti chamado Coco que vive em uma fortaleza debaixo do metrô
